mean_cn: adv. 颠倒地，上下倒置地
mean_en: in or into a position in which the top of something is where the bottom is normally found and the bottom is where the top is normally found
sentence: Wine glasses are hung upside-down over the bar to keep dust out of them.
sentence_trans: 红酒杯被倒挂在酒吧，这样可以防止灰尘进入。
word_etyma: upside上 + down下 → upside-down颠倒的，乱七八糟的
